text: Ellie Simmonds (born 11 November 1994) is a Paralympic swimmer with Achondroplasia dwarfism. She started swimming at the age of five. When she was 13, Ellie was the second youngest British Paralympian to win a medal by competing at the Beijing 2008 Paralympic Games by winning the 100m and 400m Freestyle swimming events. == References == Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:British swimmers Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Great Britain
title: Ellie Simmonds
